Items.Name: A1 Fried Spring rolls (Chả giò)
Items.Description: 4ea/order. Egg roll wrap filled with vegetables and pork fried to a crispy golden brown.

Items.Name: A2 Salad rolls (Gỏi Cuốn)
Items.Description: 2ea/order. Rice paper wrapped with noodles, mint leaves, shrimp, pork, served with peanut sauce.

Items.Name: A3 Chicken Salad (Gỏi Gà)
Items.Description: Shredded steamed chicken with shredded cabbages and special fish sauce dressing.

Items.Name: A4 Pork Pot Sticker (Bánh Nhân Thịt Chiên)
Items.Description: 8ea/order. Shredded napa, pork marinate in cooking wine, wrapped and fried to a crisp then steamed.

Items.Name: A5 Pork ShuMai (Bánh Xí Mại thịt Heo)
Items.Description: 7ea/order. Egg wrap filled with vegetables and pork, steamed.

Items.Name: A6 Fried Shrimps
Items.Description: 5ea/order.

Items.Name: A7 Steam Bao (Banh Bao)
Items.Description: 2 bao. Wheat flour with BBQ pork and vegetables.

Items.Header: Our Specialties: Phổ  'Fa' With Beef Broth

Items.Description: Rice Noodles, slices of beef eye round, flank and meat balls

Items.Description: Rice noodles, beef meatballs and soup, without slices of eye round steak and flank

Items.Description: Beef meatballs and beef broth without the noodles

Items.Name: P4 Egg Noodle Soup (Pho Dac Biet)
Items.Description: Rice Noodles, slices of beef eye round, flank and meat balls

Items.Description: Egg noodle or rice noodle and shredded chicken in chicken broth

Items.Description: Egg noodles, won-ton skin wrapped with pord marinated
